PRODUCT NAME: O3+ Bridal Facial Kit for Radiant & Glowing Skin
Name: Sabha
Title: Very Impressed
Review:
I heard about this kit from a friend, and it is the most effective facial kit that can be used at home Right now can't comment on the effectiveness of the product, because I have used it yesterday itself, so have to wait for the results and will update the review later accordingly. But as far as ease of utilisation is concerned, it was very difficult at least for me! And main reason for that is there was no users manual or any guideline provided with it in the pack!! So had to search YouTube to get an idea about how exactly to use it, which step to follow after the other, what to mix, whether to wipe it after use or not, for how long that particular product in that small pouch to keep on face!! (And all the videos available on YouTube also are not very helpful. Because most of them have at least one pouch missing from there kit!).
As far as product quantity is concerned, it is absolutely sufficient for one time use, no problem in that. And mostly the products will be effective on skin as well, but I was pissed off with no availability of manual. In total It took almost 3h for me to first figure out how to use it and then to do actual facial!! There should be clear guidance on how to use it. For example, the detain cream given in the kit gave me burning sensation. So is it normal? Are we supposed to expect that from it? Or was I supposed to take it off immediately after having burning sensation? All these things should be clearly mentioned somewhere. When someone buys facial kit online, that many times also means that the person is unable to go to the parlor for whatever reason and hence trying to do the facial on own! Clear Instructions must be given in the kit. One how to pamphlet will not cost manufacturers much.
Update- when I ordered it second time, the package not only had a very detailed instructions pamphlet with photos of each step, but the products in the packet also were arranged almost in the same order! That made its use really easy. Very impressive!
Hence increasing rating to 5 stars.

Review: The quality of o3 product are undoubtedly the best . It's bit on the expensive side. However it's really worth your money. The face mask h ves amaxing cooling effect. Unless someone has really really oily skin, I would highly recommend this serum, though I believe it would work for all skin types. Other than that, I have noticed any serious lightening of pimple marks on the face, but it does give the skin a better glow and makes it soft, supple and plump.

PRODUCT NAME: Sulfur Cooling Facial Mask
Name: isht kour
Title: The best facial mask..!!
Review: I have tried the O3 + Dermal Zone Sulfur Cooling Facial Masque and the first few words which come to my mind are - purifying, smells like peppermint and absolutely refreshing and a "MUST HAVE" in your beauty kit! I applied this masque evenly on my face and left it undisturbed for 15-20 minutes by just laying in bed with my eyes closed and listening to healing and meditative Reiki music in the background. Then I washed it out with cool water instead of wiping it off with a wet towel. Well, that's because I am one of those people who loves to splash water on my face and enjoy it. My skin feels very soft, smooth and supple after using this facial masque. I love the fragrance of peppermint that this has been blessed with. My skin definitely felt light and cool as well as extremely relaxed and thankful on using this product. I also experienced a de-tan effect

PRODUCT NAME: Hair Spa Kit

PRODUCT NAME: Meladerm Vitamin C Gel Bleach
Name: Akansha
Title: Value for money
Review: This is the safest bleach that you can go for. I have been using it and it feels fantastic on the skin. It doesn't cause any irritation like most other bleaches do in the market. It is gel based rather having a creamy texture and maintains the hydration level of the skin. Bleaches too often aren't healthy for skin but if required, never shy away from this one GRLZZ.

It is a really good cleanser and the fact that there are no harmful chemicals used in it, makes it worth the price.
